definition: vast as the open sea (idiom); fig. extensive (library)
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: You can install a huge number of popular software at one go with this tool.
sentences.chinese: 用了它你可以一氣呵成地下載浩如煙海的流行軟件。

sentences.english: As such, it was used in huge volumes of Japanese audio equipment.
sentences.chinese: 因此，它被用來在浩如煙海的日本音響設備。
